author: hanniabu
content:
Has there been any research into a final optimal blob target? I think it'd be good to figure this out for L2s to plan around as well as public sentiment and understanding of the end goal.

I understand right now we're planning on raising it from 3 to 5 in order to support blob adoption amongst L2s. However, I do have concern around when we put an end to expanding "free" blob space. L2s have a large incentive to keep lobbying for raising the target as it keeps their costs low and revenue high.

For L2s, having a known final target helps them better plan their go-to-market and growth strategy. From the public sentiment side, many feel the target will continually be raised and there hasn't been any indication on a final target.
